title: Is the Gaming Poro Icon Bundle Exclusive?
body: Or can he be bought through rewards from quests?

replies.body: AFAIK currently, it looks like that specific Arcade Poro icon can only be obtained through the pass for now. There's a chance it might be available in orbs or chests later on, but as of right now if you want that icon you may want to go ahead and buy the Dungeon Pass.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KGmMW5kd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-10T21:35:22.355+0000)
>
> AFAIK currently, it looks like that specific Arcade Poro icon can only be obtained through the pass for now. There's a chance it might be available in orbs or chests later on, but as of right now if you want that icon you may want to go ahead and buy the Dungeon Pass.

Thanks for checking! :)
Yes , how can I get it too ?
